1.title: From Under the Red Carpet - Katy Perry Roars

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

1.plot: From Whatsit Productions Films comes the latest daytime talk show sensation... Join Susie Sloshered with her celebrity guest hosts. Katy Perry answers all your questions about Roar, Barbara Walters, her failed marriage to Russel Brand and how to sing like a Superstar.

2.title: Now I'm a Belieber

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

2.plot: From Whatsit Productions Films comes the latest daytime talk show sensation... Join Susie Sloshered with her celebrity guest hosts. Justine Belieber answers all your questions about Justin Bieber. Interview with Suzie Sloshered, host of From Under The Red Carpet.

3.title: Obama, Hillary, Inhaling and the Common Core

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

3.plot: Justine Belieber is back and discussing politics! From common core to the presidency and terrorism, she's got something to say!

4.title: Sleeping with the Chinese and Kim Kardashian

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

4.plot: Join Susie Sloshered with her celebrity guest host Kim Kardashian and Justine Belieber who is back and discussing politics. From the presidency sleeping with the Chinese to Donald Trump's head of hair and the Mexicans, she's got something to say.

5.title: Operation Jade Helm and Chinese Chicken Washing

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

5.plot: Join Susie Sloshered with her junior correspondant Justine Belieber is back and discussing politics. From Chinese chicken washing to Operation Jade Helm, she has something to say.

6.title: Nicki Minaj and Miley Cyrus Pat Their Pum Pums

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

6.plot: From Nicki Minaj and Justin Bieber crying at the VMAs to the Iran Nuclear Deal, Justine has something to say. Join Susie Sloshered and Justine Belieber on Under the Red Carpet.

7.title: The No Fly Zone Seagull Snafu

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

7.plot: From Nicki Minaj and Justin Bieber crying at the VMAs to the Iran Nuclear Deal, Justine has something to say! Join Susie Sloshered and Justine Belieber on Under the Red Carpet.

8.title: Green Poop and Celebrities

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

8.plot: From Burger King turning America's poop green, the Pope and Miley Cyrus and Hillary Clinton on SNL, Justine has something to say! For the latest news on your favorite celebrities to world events watch News From Under the Red Carpet for a funny and informative commentary.

9.title: Ben Carson and Celebrity Censorship

episode of.title: From Under the Red Carpet (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

9.plot: From Celebrity Censorship, Animal Cruelty, Halloween costumes to Ben Carson and Caitlyn Jenner nude on Playboy, Justine has something to say! For the latest news on your favorite celebrities to world events watch News From Under the Red Carpet for a funny and informative commentary.
